channel.title: Publications on Matthieu Jimenez Website
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Matthieu Jimenez Website

item.title: Publications
item.description:
International Conferences

  • (2016) Matthieu Jimenez, Mike Papadakis, Yves Le Traon. “An Empirical Analysis of Vulnerabilities in OpenSSL and the Linux Kernel” in Proceedings of the 23rd Asia-Pacific Software Engineering Conference (APSEC’16), University of Waikato, Hamilton, New Zealand, 6-9 December 2016

    • OrbiLu
    • Additional Figures

  • (2016) Matthieu Jimenez, Mike Papadakis, Yves Le Traon. “Vulnerability Prediction Models: A case study on the Linux Kernel” in Proceedings of the 16th IEEE International Working Conference on Source Code Analysis and Manipulation (SCAM’16), Raleigh, USA, 2-3 October 2016

    • OrbiLu

  • (2016) Matthieu Jimenez, Mike Papadakis, Tegawende F. Bissyande, Jacques Klein. “Profiling Android Vulnerabilities” in Proceedings of 2016 IEEE International Conference on Software Quality, Reliability and Security (QRS’16) IEEE, p222-229, Vienna, Austria, 1-3 August 2016

    • OrbiLu

International workshops

  • (2014) Cyril Cecchinel, Matthieu Jimenez, Sébastien Mosser, Michel Riveill. “An Architecture to Support the Collection of Big Data in the Internet of Things” (workshop) in Proceedings of the International Workshop on Ubiquitous Mobile cloud (co-located with SERVICES) (UMC’14), IEEE, pages 1-8, Anchorage, Alaska, USA, 27-2 June 2014

    • Bibtex
